title: APT / COMMUNIST MEETING DOOR
description: Door leading to the Storage Room where the Secret Communist Meeting takes place. (PART OF THE COMMUNIST DREAM QUEST)

dialogueTree.title: Metal Grille Door: "You can hear animated voices coming..."
dialogueTree.text: You can hear animated voices coming from the other side of the grille.

links.title: You: ""Hey, it's me again!" (Knock on the..."
links.text: "Hey, it's me again!" (Knock on the grille.)

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "You hear the voices conferring once..."
links.text: You hear the voices conferring once again.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""He came back?" There's a note of s..."
links.text: "He came back?" There's a note of surprise in the voice. "Do you have the passphrase this time?"

links.title: You: ""It's 'Blessed are the sausage grin..."
links.text: "It's 'Blessed are the sausage grinders'."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Did he say something about sausage..."
links.text: "Did he say something about sausages?" The voice appears completely confused by your response

links.title: You: ""It's 'We await the silent mole emp..."
links.text: "It's 'We await the silent mole empire'."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""He said something about moles. Per..."
links.text: "He said something about moles. Perhaps he's just a night-wandering lunatic."

links.title: You: ""It's 'The end times cometh'.""
links.text: "It's 'The end times cometh'."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Not even close.""
links.text: "Not even close."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Perhaps he's drunk?" the other voi..."
links.text: "Perhaps he's drunk?" the other voice asks.

links.title: You: ""It's 'Disco Supernova'.""
links.text: "It's 'Disco Supernova'."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""No, it's not. We don't do ironic p..."
links.text: "No, it's not. We don't do ironic passphrases here."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Are you locked out of your radioco..."
links.text: "Are you locked out of your radiocomputer or something? No, it's not '1234'."

links.title: You: ""It's 'Remember Dobreva and Abadana..."
links.text: "It's 'Remember Dobreva and Abadanaiz'."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "There's no response. You begin to w..."
links.text: There's no response. You begin to wonder whether they've slipped out some back way...

links.title: Inland Empire: "No! They're still there. You can *f..."
links.text: No! They're still there. You can *feel* them back there.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Alright. The key's taped to the ba..."
links.text: "Alright. The key's taped to the back of the doorframe. Just make sure you put it back when you're done or we'll all be locked out..."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""And do watch the concrete. It just..."
links.text: "And do watch the concrete. It just kind of... falls away... in places."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Charmant*. After you, detective.""
links.text: "*Charmant*. After you, detective."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have fun at your *underground meet..."
links.text: "Have fun at your *underground meeting*, pig. Hope it's a *blast*."

links.title: You: ""Can't I get a hint at least?""
links.text: "Can't I get a hint at least?"

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Not a chance. We can't afford to c..."
links.text: "Not a chance. We can't afford to compromise our operation, not at this point. Come back when you know the passphrase."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Look at that, the pig's trying to..."
links.text: "Look at that, the pig's trying to break in without the passphrase. Tsk, tsk." The girl shakes her head slowly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go, detective. We'll get now..."
links.text: "Let's go, detective. We'll get nowhere standing around in the snow." The lieutenant brushes a few scales of snow off his jacket.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go, detective. We'll get now..."
links.text: "Let's go, detective. We'll get nowhere standing around in the rain." The lieutenant wipes back a wet lock of hair.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go, detective. We'll get now..."
links.text: "Let's go, detective. We'll get nowhere standing around here in the dark." The moonlight reflects white in the lieutenant's glasses.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "The metal grille is cool to the tou..."
links.text: The metal grille is cool to the touch. The long stretches of canvas billow like sails in the night breeze.

links.title: You: ""Look, I don't know your passphrase..."
links.text: "Look, I don't know your passphrase. Could you just let me in?"

links.title: You: "Try to listen."
links.text: Try to listen.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "You can make out at least two separ..."
links.text: You can make out at least two separate voices.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Two voices, both male. Approximatel..."
links.text: Two voices, both male. Approximately early 20s.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""... Careful with those now...""
links.text: "... Careful with those now..."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""I have it. It's going to work, I c..."
links.text: "I have it. It's going to work, I can feel it..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "The voices are male, you think. Bey..."
links.text: The voices are male, you think. Beyond that, you can't tell...

links.title: You: "Bang on the grille."
links.text: Bang on the grille.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "The clang of metal reverberates all..."
links.text: The clang of metal reverberates all along the scaffolding. The voices coming from the other side fall silent.

links.title: Half Light: "A pair of frightened hares cowering..."
links.text: A pair of frightened hares cowering in some dark crevice of their burrow.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Who's there? Is that you, Maurice?""
links.text: "Who's there? Is that you, Maurice?"

links.title: You: ""It's not Maurice, it's the police!""
links.text: "It's not Maurice, it's the police!"

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Ever hear of the Wayfarer Act, you..."
links.text: "Ever hear of the Wayfarer Act, you Coalition pawn? Come back when you've got a warrant, or when you've woken up to your own class interests."

links.title: You: ""That's exactly why I'm here! I'm t..."
links.text: "That's exactly why I'm here! I'm trying to get organised. Can you help me?"

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "For a moment, silence."
links.text: For a moment, silence.

links.title: Shivers: "A slight sensation of static electr..."
links.text: A slight sensation of static electricity, as before a storm. A miniature conference is taking place inside, and you are the subject.

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""What's the passphrase?""
links.text: "What's the passphrase?"

links.title: You: ""That's right. It is I... Maurice.""
links.text: "That's right. It is I... Maurice."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Come crawling back already? Get ou..."
links.text: "Come crawling back already? Get out of here, traitor!"

links.title: You: ""Uhh...""
Metal Grille Door: ""That's right!" Another voice jumps..."
links.text: "That's right!" Another voice jumps in. "Take your miniscule, bourgeois turnips and get lost!"

links.title: Drama: "Face it, sire, your little subterfu..."
links.text: Face it, sire, your little subterfuge isn't leading anywhere.

links.title: You: ""I'm not actually Maurice. I'm tryi..."
links.text: "I'm not actually Maurice. I'm trying to get organised. Can you help me?"

links.title: You: ""Are you all communists? I'm lookin..."
links.text: "Are you all communists? I'm looking for some communists."

links.title: Metal Grille Door: ""Who said communist? Did *we* say c..."
links.text: "Who said communist? Did *we* say communist? Get out of here."

links.title: You: ""Listen, I've already built like .0..."
links.text: "Listen, I've already built like .0001% of communism but now I need to get organised. Can you help me?"

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Metal Grille Door: "As you approach the metal grille yo..."
dialogueTree.text: As you approach the metal grille you can hear several voices having what appears to be an animated discussion.

links.title: Rhetoric: "This must be it. Beyond this door l..."
links.text: This must be it. Beyond this door lies the beating heart of radical communism in Martinaise.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Somehow the night air softens the s..."
links.text: Somehow the night air softens the smell of trash and sea brine. As the breeze pulls through the canvas like a shuttle through a loom you catch a hint of something unexpected, something earthy, warm, and burnt...

links.title: Rhetoric: "The acrid smell of failure..."
links.text: The acrid smell of failure...

links.title: Electrochemistry: "No, that's just slightly burnt coff..."
links.text: No, that's just slightly burnt coffee. A smell you would recognise anywhere.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Just look at this pig, sniffing ab..."
links.text: "Just look at this pig, sniffing about after-hours..."

links.title: You: ""Why didn't you say the secret door..."
links.text: "Why didn't you say the secret door was *right behind you*?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Must have slipped my mind. You kno..."
links.text: "Must have slipped my mind. You know how it goes." She gives you a lackadaisical shrug.

links.title: You: ""Hey, it's past curfew! Get to bed,..."
links.text: "Hey, it's past curfew! Get to bed, Cindy!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Go ahead and arrest me, officer. I..."
links.text: "Go ahead and arrest me, officer. I swear I'll go peacefully." You can feel her smirk through the dark.

links.title: You: "(Ignore her.)"
links.text: (Ignore her.)

links.title: Metal Grille Door: "The metal grille is cool to the tou..."
links.text: The metal grille is cool to the touch.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You notice the lieutenant is lookin..."
links.text: You notice the lieutenant is looking uncustomarily anxious. His posture is rigid, his right hand hovers near the zipper of his jacket.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "He wants so badly to draw his Armis..."
links.text: He wants so badly to draw his Armistice, but he also doesn't *want* to want to draw it.

links.title: You: ""You okay, Kim?""
links.text: "You okay, Kim?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh, I'm fine. I was practically *b..."
links.text: "Oh, I'm fine. I was practically *born* to infiltrate underground communist cells..." He takes a quick look over his shoulder.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which is just to say: We should be..."
links.text: "Which is just to say: We should be prepared for *any* eventuality."

links.title: You: ""Relax, they're only communists.""
links.text: "Relax, they're only communists."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Something's not right here. The eq..."
links.text: "Something's not right here. The equation doesn't quite balance..." He taps his foot and takes a deep breath.

links.title: You: "Say nothing."
links.text: Say nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well, detective. It seems we've lo..."
links.text: "Well, detective. It seems we've located your underground cell..." He looks over the balcony, down toward the water.
